1500770.name: ∀kashicverse  Soundtrack box - ∀kashicbox vol.1
1500770.description:
Overview

This is a fan box for the "∀kashicverse -Malicious Wake-".
It contains the soundtrack of the music used in "∀kashicverse -Malicious Wake-"
It also includes an arrangement album.

Data

  • Disc1-2 ∀kashicverse -Malicious Wake- Original Soundtrack
  • Disc3 ∀kashicverse Compilation Album -Amor Platonicus-

Special Contents

The "special" directory of local files contains liner notes and other files.
Please enjoy these as well.
